display_name: Fail. Less than 2 hours of oximetry and nasal pressure or one band
Poor. Oximetry and either nasal pressure or one band useable for >= 2 hours but less than 4 hours
Fair. Oximetry and either nasal pressure or one band useable for >= 4 hours
Good. At least nasal pressure, one band, and oximetry or both bands and oximetry useable for >= 4 hours
Excellent. All channels are useable for >= 4 hours but < 6 hours
Outstanding. All channels are good for >= 6 hours
